name: Pedro's Adventure
description:
Description:

Play as an investigator named Pedro who works for an organization led by the 3 daughters of bathala. 

The organization tasked Pedro to investigate a Mangkukulam sighting in a certain province and a missing investigator that was stationed. 

Explore and unravel the mystery of what happened.

Year and Term of Capstone: 

 CAPSTONE 2, 2nd Term, Academic Year 2020-2021

Team Work-In-Progress:

Programmer: Paolo Arevalo

Programmer and Sound Designer: Kylelle Wesley Chua
